long_description: Take a tour around town or set out to see the world in the leather Merrell Traveler Spin shoes. Full-grain leather and cow suede uppers have breathable mesh linings to keep your feet cool. Anatomic foot frames integrate resilient foam cushioning and contoured support to give you a combination of natural freedom of movement, stability and all-day comfort. EVA midsoles and heel air pods absorb shock and cushion feet. M-Select FRESH natural enzymes prevent odors from developing. Merrell Traveler Spin shoes have rubber outsoles with 3mm lugs for sure traction.
short_description: Take a tour around town or set out to see the world in the leather Merrell Traveler Spin shoes.
